CollectionGrid.title: Collections
CollectionGrid.description: Create and view inventory collections here.
CollectionGrid.emptyState: No collections available. Create a new collection to get started.

ModalWrapper.title: Create Collection
ModalWrapper.description: Create a new collection by providing the necessary details.
ModalWrapper.editDescription: Edit the details of your collection.

CollectionReorderModal.title: Visibility and Reorder Collections
CollectionReorderModal.description: Rearrange collections by dragging and dropping them to set their display order in your store. Top three collections are visible on your PLP page.

ConfirmDeleteCollection.title: Delete Collection
ConfirmDeleteCollection.confirmationText: Are you sure you want to delete this collection? You will no longer have access to this collection.

RuleModal.blockchainNetworkDescription: Choose a blockchain to verify possession or ownership of a required digital asset/NFT.
RuleModal.gatingMessageDescription: Provide the text to display to visitors that will appear inside the access modal.
RuleModal.minimumAssetsDescription: Set the minimum number of digital assets/NFTs a user must hold to meet this ruleset minimumNftRequired.
RuleModal.nftUrlDescription: Choose this option to display the marketplace listing page to visitors where the collection is officially being traded.
RuleModal.nftUrlPlaceholder: Paste link to your NFT page or marketplace here
RuleModal.discountDescription: Enable this function to offer an exclusive discount to holders that meet the requirements.
RuleModal.createDescription: Create a new ruleset by providing the necessary details.
RuleModal.editDescription: Edit the details of your ruleset.

address.label: Contract Address
address.description: Enter the contract addresses to be used for validation of possession or ownership.

validation.addressMinimum: At least one address is required
validation.addressEmpty: Address cannot be an empty string

ModalWrapperRulesets.editDescription: Edit the details of your ruleset.
ModalWrapperRulesets.createDescription: Create a new ruleset by providing the necessary details.

BlockchainNetworkSelect.blockchainNetworkDescription: Choose a blockchain to verify possession or ownership of a required digital asset/NFT.

GatingMessageInput.gatingMessageDescription: Provide the text to display to visitors that will appear inside the access modal.

MinimumAssetsRequiredInput.minimumAssetsDescription: Set the minimum number of digital assets/NFTs a user must hold to meet this ruleset minimumNftRequired.

NftUrlInput.nftUrlDescription: Choose this option to display the marketplace listing page to visitors where the collection is officially being traded.
NftUrlInput.nftUrlPlaceholder: Paste link to your NFT page or marketplace here

visibility.error: You cannot change your collection status at this time. Please try again later

name.label: Collection Name
name.description: Provide a title to the collection that will be displayed to site visitors.

description.description: Provide the message to display to visitors.

validation.nameRequired: Please provide a name for the collection
validation.imageRequired: Please provide an image for the collection
